channel.title: rust on Software and puns
channel.description: Recent content in rust on Software and puns

item.title: Scratching NASDAQ's ITCH
item.description: I am building yet another order book tool in Rust, which requires me to parse L3 (full) market data feed from NASDAQ.

item.title: Using Docker to reproduce a read-only file system
item.description: This is part 2 of my journey adding read-only mode to tantivy.

item.title: Don't mistake file permissions for read-only fs mounts
item.description: I enjoy contributing to tantivy, a Lucene-like library in Rust.

item.title: Rust - from 0 to productive in 2 weeks
item.description: This is a story of me going from making sarcastic jokes about rewriting everything in Rust to becoming one of them growing to like the language.

item.title: Compiling a Rust library to wasm
item.description: Since finding Paul Masurel’s tantivy searching/indexing library, I thought it would be cool to make the library available for the browser.
